title: List of La Liga stadiums
text:
Since the inception of <a href="La%20Liga">La Liga</a> in 1929, Spain's highest level of <a href="association%20football">association football</a> annual <a href="League%20system">league</a> tournament, 88 football stadiums have been used to host matches. The inaugural round of La Liga matches took place on 10 February 1929 with five clubs hosting the opening fixtures.
<a href="Estadio%20El%20Alcoraz">El Alcoraz</a> was the latest stadium to host its first La Liga match, and the <a href="Metropolitano%20Stadium">Wanda Metropolitano</a> is the arena that was built most recently.
Stadiums.
Stadiums listed in bold indicate that they are the home grounds of teams participating in the <a href="2020%E2%80%9321%20La%20Liga">2020–21 La Liga</a> season, while those stadiums listed in "italics" have now been demolished.
